notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: J.A., F.K. designed the study and contributed to the analysis of the results; J.A., F.K., Å».A., M.K., C.G., D.-M.A., D.M. performed the experiments and data calculations; C.J. generated the figures; Sz.P. performed the SEM analyses; J.A., F.K., B.M. wrote the manuscript; K.G. assisted with data interpretation and edited the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
